alert.note: Alert for Coastal Georgetown; Inland Georgetown; Williamsburg (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 03 at 12:57AM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...AREAS OF FOG, WITH PATCHES OF DENSE FOG, TO PLAGUE EARLY MORNING TRAVELERS AND MARINERS... Motorists and mariners this morning will come across areas of fog that reduces visibility to 1 mile or less at times. Embedded within these areas, visibility may drop to less than 1/2 mile. If driving, slow down, use your low beam headlights, and leave plenty of braking distance between you and the vehicle ahead. If navigating across inland waterways such as Winyah Bay and local rivers and tributaries, slow down, make sure running lights are displayed. Additionally, make use of GPS, depth finders and the local aids to navigation.
